Template.HtmlPart:
Hello {{requestUserFirstName}},

{{managerUserFullName}} has marked your request for '{{itemName}}' as fulfilled.

The cost of the item ({{cost}}) has been removed from your point total. Your new total is {{newPointTotal}}.
Template.TextPart:
Hello {{requestUserFirstName}},
{{managerUserFullName}} has marked your purchase for '{{itemName}}' as fulfilled.
The cost of the item ({{cost}}) has been removed from your point total. Your new total is {{newPointTotal}}.
